p: All travelers should be advised to mobilize their legs regularly during travel, ideally by walking or by flexing and extending their ankles to encourage blood flow. Patients identified as high risk of VTE should consider the use of fitted compression socks. Low molecular weight heparin may also be considered for high-risk travellers [ 110] or a Direct Oral Anti-Coagulant. This can be discussed with local hematology services if desired.
